AccountContactRelation.name: AccountContactRelation
AccountContactRelation.description: Standard and custom fields extend the standard Account object for use in Public Sector Solutions to represent information of members in a household

DataRollupCategories.description: Specifies the categories in which the data associated with a group is aggregated.

EndDate.description: The date a relationship between a contact and account ended. Use with the Start Date to keep a history of the relationship.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether relationship is active (true) or not (false).

IsDirect.description: Indicates whether relationship is direct (true) or not (false).

IsIncludedInGroup.description: Indicates whether the data of a group or a business account is included in the Household (true) or not (false).

IsPrimaryGroup.description: Indicates whether the group is a primary group for the member (yes) or not (no).

IsPrimaryMember.description: Indicates whether the member is a primary contact of a group (true) or not (false).

StartDate.description: The date a relationship between a contact and account began. Use with the End Date to keep a history of the relationship
